text: e 01111110 01000111 11100011 11100000 11100000 11100000 01111110 01111110 Correct Option Solution : © Under byte stuffing flag bits are used as starting and ending delimiters. Apart from this if the code for flag is there in data, ESC character is used with the flag. If “ESC” is also there in the code then one more ‘ESC’ character is used.
